aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text1: I am a frontend programmer with experience in creating websites and web applications.
aboutMe.text2: My professional experience these last few months has been mainly with Lit element and web components, I have also worked with Angular, React and Vuejs.
aboutMe.text3: I've also worked with Typescript, I've applied unit testing with jest and cypress. I follow an agile philosophy, in particular the scrum.
aboutMe.text4: I am currently continuing my training by studying the Frontend master's degree at LemonCode.

form.message: If you want to get in touch with me, talk about a collaboration project or just say hello fill out the form below or send an email to my email link and ~let's talk.
